page.title: 15RECREATION -BREAKDANCING
page.content: Breakdancing is where people go on the floor and do a{funny dance by {waving their arms and legs in the air. It is practised by a lot of boys and some girls. It originated in New York in 1969. Breakdancers wear{special {clothing}and quite often they also wear gloves. If they dance in the street then they{use a square of lino, which is polished, to help them move and spin on their backs, arms & legs. Breakdancing has also a{special {language and music.}The music played is fast and has a predominant beat. Breakdancers carry Ghettoblasters which are cassette players with a high output. Breakdancing is really a{combination {of spins and movements.}Each dancer tries to be better than anyone else and shows off. When someone is dancing everyone crowds round to watch.
